author: nishant0
content: For gossipsub params, was there a particular reason `mcache_gossip` was set as 3 ? Currently we are seeing a few unfulfilled promises in medalla, while not very often they do happen once in a while.  With heartbeats being 700ms, that gives a window of only 2.1 seconds till a node can give a valid response to the corresponding `IWANT` from a remote peer. Curious to know if any other clients might have come across similar issues
